detail_desc: Top in soft, lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck opening at the top and a vertical seam down the front.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Light support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a bow at the front.
Wide, off-the-shoulder blouse woven in an airy linen blend with wide elastication at the top, buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves.
Dress in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and embroidery detail on the chest. Short sleeves with ribbed trims, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a lace section over the shoulders and a wide neckline with gathers front and back.
A-line dress in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Unlined.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a flounce at the top and high-cut legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Straight-style shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke at the back, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Top in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a shimmering motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace dress with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, decorative details on the sleeves, a rounded hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fake chest pocket and fake flap front pockets. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Bralette in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders, gently tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with sparkly stones in the sides, zip fly with a button and straight legs with creases.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.
Skater skirt in fine, textured-knit cotton with concealed elastication at the waist and a stocking-stitched hem.
Fitted jumpsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and print motif on the legs.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in lightweight twill made from viscose and recycled polyester. High waist with pleats at the front and shaping darts at the back, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases.

Hoodie knitted in soft, thermal fleece. Zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and a jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The hoodie is made partly from recycled polyester.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with short sleeves and an opening at the bottom of the front.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts. Shoulder straps with plastic rings that can be tied at the back of the neck and back, and can also be crossed over at the back.
Flat, round earrings in various designs. Diameter 1.3 cm.
Elasticated hairbands in various materials and designs with a decorative bow.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with smocked trims and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Large plastic hair claw. Width 9 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery Christmas tree decoration on the top.

Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Sandals with narrow straps at the front, a heel strap and fluted soles.
Loose-fit trousers in a crêpe weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Low crotch, zip fly and tapered legs with pleats at the top, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with flounces at the front, press-studs on one shoulder and narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-studs at the front. Soft brushed inside.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

Blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, opening with buttons at the back of the neck and a lace yoke at the front. Short double-frilled sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Large scarf in a super-soft chunky weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 33x175 cm.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and roomy legs. Button fly and raw-edge hems.

Windbreaker in nylon with a detachable hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves. Welt front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Set with a cotton jersey T-shirt and pair of denim shorts. T-shirt with an all-over print and ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs. Slim fit.
Coat in soft imitation suede with notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist, and pockets in the side seams. No fasteners. Unlined.
Short top in lace with a round neck, long sleeves and scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, fine-knit socks designed to be hidden by your shoes with a silicone trim at the back of the heel to keep them in place.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with sweatshirt fabric sleeves, a small stand-up collar and a lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a smocked stand-up collar, opening with small buttons at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.
Wrapover top in jersey with a V-neck, seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves.
Hat in a soft, fluffy, rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.
Short faux fur jacket with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Satin lining.
Beach bag in plastic with a perforated pattern, two handles at the top and a glittery imitation leather charm. Size 10x18x26 cm.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with lace. Padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with flounce-trimmed cut-out sections at the shoulders.

Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband. Two-part, gathered elastic straps with a small frill trim at the top to create cut-out details at the sides, and a high cut at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton flannel containing glittery threads. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Fitted, V-neck dress in sturdy jersey with long sleeves and a cut-out section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Bra in microfibre and mesh with decorative straps at the front and underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
